column4: You open the Chest to find:
column5: A large Chest sits in the corner of the room.

column4: You open the Wardrobe to discover:
column5: A large Wardrobe sits in the middle of the Shack.

column4: While looking through the small Pouch you discover:
column5: A small Pouch sits besides the fire, half buried.

column4: To search the Backpack, you put it on you backwards from how you would wear it normally, unzip it, and stick your head in it to find:
column5: There's a Backpack laying against a log a few feet from the campfire.

column4: You shove your hand into the hole in the Tree showing no fear! You find:
column5: A certain Tree sticks out to you, it has a huge dark hole in the middle of it.

column4: you reach into the vreaky box and see:
You reach as far down into the Hole and begin feeling around blindly. You somehow find:
column5: You see a fairly large Hole in the ground dug out of the sand.

column4: You search the Wrecked Boat finding:
column5: There seems to be a Wrecked Boat that is beached on the shore. You should probably investigate as there can be some good loot in there.
